pages.text: Mixing dusts creates an alloy blend that can then be smelted into alloyed ingots. $(br)Constantan has thermo-electric properties and is used in creating the $(l:patchouli:power/thermoelectric_generator)thermoelectric generator$() and electrum is an excellent electric conductor used in $(l:patchouli:power/basic_wiring)medium-voltage architecture$().
